snippet.title: Become an Owl Shinobi in ATOMIC OWL - Reveal Trailer [Monster Theater]
snippet.description:
Introducing Atomic Owl, indie studio Monster Theater's very first game! Coming to PC, Playstation, Xbox, and Nintendo Switch in 2025 🦉🎮

Become Hidalgo, the Owl Shinobi, and embrace kinetic combat inspired by lightning-fast classic side scrollers in the neo-roguelite adventure Atomic Owl. Cut your way through eight challenging mini-roguelike zones in the beautiful world of Judanest. Discover powerful ‘Wing Remnants’ and equip them to change the topography of combat, and turn the tables in your favor.

Atomic Owl is a Japanese-themed, synthwave-infused roguelite platformer that pays homage to games like MegaMan X, Celeste, Shovel Knight, and Dead Cells.

Atomic Owl combines fast-paced platforming through a Neo-Japanese-inspired world with dynamic hack-and-slash combat and a variety of weapons, powerups, and a demonic blade. Journey through eight roguelite zones, save the Bladewing troupe, and take up chatty arms against the evil Crow Sorcerer, Omega Wing!

Follow Monster Theater and Atomic Owl’s Progress on Socials:
X (Twitter): https://x.com/monstertheaterx
Threads:  https://www.threads.net/@monstertheaterofficial
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/monstertheaterofficial/
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@monstertheatergames

Join the Monster Theater Games community Discord: https://discord.gg/Kj2wfmY7r3

Support the Team on Patreon and Unlock Exclusive Digital Rewards: https://www.patreon.com/MonsterTheater

Kickstarter Campaign (Closed & Fully Funded): https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/monstertheater/atomic-owl
